umtz_hdr_ Struct Reference

#include <umtzlib.h>


Data Fields

char data [MTZRECLEN]

Detailed Description

An MTZ header record.

Contains an array of characters holding the text of the header.

Field Documentation

char umtz_hdr_::data
 

The string representation of the header.

The header string should be padded to 80 characters with spaces and have no null terminator.
